---
title: "Calculator: 2D graphical calculator"
author: Tom Coleman
format: html
abstract-title: Summary
abstract: A blank 2D graphical calculator for general use.
---

```{r, setup, include = FALSE}
library("webexercises")
```


<div id="calculator2" style="width: 100%; height: 500px;"></div>

<script>
  var elt = document.getElementById('calculator2');
  var calculator2 = Desmos.GraphingCalculator(elt);
  calculator2.setMathBounds({ left: -20, right: 20, bottom: -20, top: 20});
  calculator2.setExpression({ id: "n0", type: "text", text: 'This is a blank 2D graphical calculator for you to enter anything you want! Click the X to delete this message, and click on the expression below to edit.'});
  calculator2.setExpression({id: 'surface', latex: 'y = x^2 + 1', color: '#3F68B6'});
</script>
